full_summary:
# Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN)
## Notice Title
ACAN – 7K Wheat Array High Throughput Genotyping
## Notice Number
PW-22-01006602
## Publication Date
2022-09-08

## Notice Details
* Notice Type: Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN)
* Procurement Method: Competitive – Limited Tendering
* Acronyms: CFTA (Canadian Free Trade Agreement), CCFTA (Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement), CHPA (Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement), CFTA (Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement), Columbian FTA (Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement), Panama FTA (Canada-Panama FTA), CKFTA (Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement)
* Regions: Unspecified
* Regions of Delivery: Saskatchewan
* Contracting Entity: Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada
* Contracting Entity Address: 1341 Baseline Road, Ottawa, ON K1A 0C5, Canada
* Contact Information:
* Name: Melissa Smith
* Email: melissa.smith3@agr.gc.ca
* Phone: 306-515-4796

## Notice Description
Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada intends to award a service contract to SGS Institut Fresenius TraitGenetics for the following services:
* Perform pre-analysis quality checks on supplied DNA samples.
* Perform high throughput genotyping on 5,760 DNA samples using the 7K Wheat Array High Throughput Genotyping Platform.
* Perform post-processing data manipulation for genomic selection analysis.

## Tender Details
* Tender Status: Expired (Note: This tender has already expired, and the notice is provided as a public notice of the expected contract award)
* Tender Closing Date and Time: 2022-09-22T16:00:00
* Estimated Contract Value: CAD 177,126 (exempt from tax)

## Notice Restrictions
* Only SGS Institut Fresenius TraitGenetics is allowed to provide the services.
* Other suppliers must submit a Statement of Capabilities by 2022-09-22 14:00 (HNC) to demonstrate their eligibility.

## Evaluation Criteria
* The Statement of Capabilities must clearly demonstrate how the supplier meets the advertised requirements.
* The supplier must be authorized value-added resellers or distributors of SGS Institut Fresenius TraitGenetics 7K Wheat Array High Throughput Genotyping Platform.
